name: Beringer Technology Group
description:
Each of us, from our leadership team to our engineers to our office staff is here to understand and support your business with technology solutions. We’ve built a team with the expertise and skills that set us apart. 
We take the time to get to know you and your company – your goals, successes, challenges and everything in between. 
We are the region’s premier IT solutions provider that specializes in Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Office 365, Managed IT Services, Backup and Disaster Recovery, Cloud Computing and Unified Communication Systems.
Beringer Technology Group has been recognized in the top 1% of Microsoft’s partner ecosystem as Gold certified for more than a decade. We are Microsoft Gold Certified with multiple certifications in Microsoft Dynamics 365 (CRM), Cloud Productivity (Office 365) and SMB Cloud Solutions.
